greeting.title: Software Developer
greeting.statement: I’m an experienced web and mobile developer with a passion for Android.

timelineEvents.title: Colegio Nuestra Señora de los Angeles
timelineEvents.description: High school in Panama. Took my first coding classes there and decided I would build software for a living.

timelineEvents.title: Oakton Community College
timelineEvents.description: Came to the US after high school and studied at Oakton for two years. Set my sights on the University of Illinois @ Urbana Champaign.

timelineEvents.title: University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
timelineEvents.description: Managed to graduate with honors from one of the most competitive CS programs in the nation.

timelineEvents.title: Banco General
timelineEvents.description: Began my journey into mobile development at a Panamanian bank. Worked on their hybrid banking app as an intern.

timelineEvents.title: Engineering City Scholars
timelineEvents.description: Jump-started my career with an edifying work-study program in Chicago. I represented this program by speaking at a promotional event for the 78th Chicago neighborhood.

timelineEvents.title: Fulcrum GT
timelineEvents.description: Interned at Fulcrum as a City Scholar. Earned the full-time position and became a full-fledged native mobile developer.

timelineEvents.title: Callibrity
timelineEvents.description: I am now a generalist at Callibrity. Currently working on a native mobile app for a Fortune 500 bank.

projects.title: Pixel Canvas
projects.summary: LED matrix controlled over the internet.

projects.title: Siphon
projects.summary: Configure ETL operations via UI. No scripting required.

projects.title: Composite Build Helper
projects.summary: IntelliJ plugin to assist with composing Gradle builds.

projects.title: Cylinder
projects.summary: Fun UI component built with React.
